ResourceHeader.ResourceName: GOES 13 High Energy Proton and Alpha Detector (HEPAD) data at 1 min Time Resolution in Spacecraft Coordinates
ResourceHeader.Description: The GOES 13 High Energy Proton and Alpha Detector (HEPAD) provides flux measurements of high energy proton and alpha particles. For more information, please see Onsager et al. 1996, Operational uses of the GOES energetic particle detectors, in GOES 8 and Beyond, Proc. SPIE, Vol. 2812, edited by E. R. Washwell, pp. 281-290, Bellingham, WA. These data files contain mainly information on the number of particles per average and count rates for the HEPAD sensor. Data files contain long descriptive header.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: NASA Office of Space Science Applications (United States), NOAA National Environmental Satellite Service (United States), Terry G. Onsager

InformationURL.Name: GOES N, O, and P Brochure
InformationURL.Description: Information about the magnetometers onboard GOES 13

AccessURL.Name: Direct access to the GOES 13 High Energy Proton and Alpha Detector (HEPAD) Data
AccessURL.Description: Direct link to the GOES 13 High Energy Proton and Alpha Detector (HEPAD) data in CSV format as well as the energetic particle data from other GOES spacecraft. The data are sorted by year, month, spacecraft, and file type. The file names indicates the data type, spacecraft number, year, month, and resolution. For example, g13_hepad_s15_1m_20100501_20100531.csv, indicates GOES 13 magnetometer data at 1 min time resolution from 2010-05-01 to 2010-05-31.

TimeSpan.Note: Time format in data files is year-month-day hour:minute:seconds. Data file may fill out the first month and last month with flags.

Keyword: High Energy Proton and Alpha Detector

Parameter.Name: Seconds of the Month
Parameter.Description: Time format in data files is year-month-day hour:minute:seconds

Parameter.Name: Quality flag for all particles >110 keV that deposit energy the D1 silicon slab
Parameter.Description: Quality flag non-zero value indicates data quality issue

Count rate of all particles >110 keV that deposit energy in the D1 silicon slab
Parameter.Description: Counts/s from all particles that deposit >110 keV in the D1 silicon slab

Parameter.Description: Quality flag non-zero value indicates data quality issue

Count rate of all particles that deposit energy in the D2 silicon slab
Parameter.Description: Counts/s from all particles that deposit >110 keV in the D2 silicon slab

Parameter.Description: Quality flag non-zero value indicates data quality issue

Parameter.Name: Count rate of all particles that deposit energy in the photomultiplier tube
Parameter.Description: Counts/s from all particles that create >13.5 keV photoelectrons in the photomultiplier tube

Parameter.Description: Quality flag non-zero value indicates data quality issue

Parameter.Name: Count rate of all particles that deposit energy in the photomultiplier tube
Parameter.Description: Counts/s from all particles that create >69 keV photoelectrons in the photomultiplier tube

Parameter.Name: Quality flag for all particles >110 keV that deposit energy in both the D1 and D2 silicon slabs

Count rate of all particles >110 keV that deposit energy in both the D1 and D2 silicon slabs
